title: Darkness Descends
description: The voice is deep, ominous, male. Her dream knocks me breathless. Iâ€™ve learned never to take her dreams for granted. Too many of them have almost come true.More about DARKNESS DESCENDS:Will Rossi made two promises to his girlfriend, Cassie, to keep her secret and to keep her safe. But after discovering other psychic teens, he is determined to learn their origin, and when a dark presence threatens Cassie, he must decide to give up his quest or risk losing her. Other works by this author: DREAMING DANGEROUSLY (Book 1 of series)
author: Kathleen Harsch
